easyDiceware: Secure password generator using the Diceware method.
easySudoku: Soothing and mellow Sudoku built with Laravel and React
shordly: URL shortener built with Axum (Rust) along with Astro to create the website.
penguinMovies: Online store for your favorite movies. It features JWT authentication, shopping cart management, and MongoDB database.
graduacion: Page created for a bachelor's graduation invitation. Developed with Astro and a backend for managing guests.
oldworld: Dark theme developed with Lua for the NeoVim code editor with relaxing colors.
